objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Science Fiction lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about family and relationships using expert register
Students create original scifi themed content about family and relationships in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using expert register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in expert register within scifi theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
